about_the_game:
[STRUGGLE FOR SURVIVAL]

The world has been ravaged by an uncontrollable epidemic. In streets filled with ruthless zombie hordes, every corner harbours a new danger. In this body cam perspective experience, the realistic viewpoint puts you right in the middle of the action.

[4-P TACTICAL CO-OP]

It is impossible to survive alone. Work with your 4-player team, share resources and develop your strategy. The role of each player is vital. Communication and coordination will be the key to success.

[COMPLETE MISSIONS, SURVIVE]

Different maps with a unique atmosphere await you. Each one is full of unique missions and challenges. Use your arsenal wisely, coordinate with your teammates and try to survive by completing missions.

[REAL-TIME THREAT]

Get a realistic experience with a body cam view, limited visibility and the need to be alert at all times. Dark corners, narrow corridors and confined spaces can be your worst enemy. Every decision and every move will affect your survival.

[EVER-INCREASING DIFFICULTY]

Each map and mission will be more challenging than the last. As the zombie hordes become increasingly dangerous, your resources will become increasingly scarce. Not only quick reflexes, but also smart strategies and teamwork will be the key to success.

[THE PRICE OF SURVIVAL]

Every bullet, every material and every second counts. You will need to use your limited resources wisely. When you run out of ammo, your medkit is empty, or one of your teammates falls, your chances of survival are dramatically reduced. Stay vigilant, appreciate every resource, and fight to keep your team alive.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may be unsuitable for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Infect Cam

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11500 veya AMD Ryzen 5 4500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super veya AMD Radeon RX 590 (8 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K veya AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 veya AMD Radeon RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Infect Cam is a co-op zombie survival game with a bodycam perspective. Team up with friends to strategize and fend off relentless undead waves in a perilous post-apocalyptic world. Manage resources, communicate effectively, and survive the intense challenges that await
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
